newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Ukraine Jan-Apr trade deficit widens to $1.57 bln.
newsitem.headline: Ukraine Jan-Apr trade deficit widens to $1.57 bln.

text.p: Ukraine's trade deficit widened to $1.57 billion in the first four months of this year from $0.4 billion in the same period last year and $1.24 billion from January to March 1997, the Statistics Ministry said on Thursday.
UKRAINE MERCHANDISE TRADE Jan-Apr 97 Jan-Mar 97 Jan-Apr 96 Exports (bln $) 4.000 2.922 3.669
NOTE - Figures are for trade with all countries. Trade with former Soviet republics resulted in a deficit of $1.996 billion.
